istanbul.title: Istanbul
istanbul.subtitle: Where East Meets West
istanbul.description: Istanbul, the only city in the world built on two continents, stands as a testament to thousands of years of human history. A center of world trade and culture, Istanbul offers visitors an unforgettable journey through time.

cappadocia.title: Cappadocia
cappadocia.subtitle: Land of Beautiful Horses
cappadocia.description: Cappadocia's surreal landscape of 'fairy chimneys' and cave churches creates an otherworldly experience. The region's unique geological features and rich history make it one of Turkey's most fascinating destinations.

antalya.title: Antalya
antalya.subtitle: Pearl of the Mediterranean
antalya.description: Antalya combines pristine Mediterranean beaches with ancient ruins and modern luxury. Its perfect climate and rich history make it an ideal destination for both relaxation and cultural exploration.
